thread.title: Blair: 'Elements of truth' to Islamic State-Iraq war link
thread.title_full: Blair: 'Elements of truth' to Islamic State-Iraq war link - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Blair: 'Elements of truth' to Islamic State-Iraq war link
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Blair: 'Elements of truth' to Islamic State-Iraq war link 25 October 2015 Last updated at 13:25 GMT
Former Prime Minister Tony Blair has admitted there are "elements of truth" in suggestions the 2003 US-led invasion of Iraq helped bring about the rise of Islamic State.
However, in a CNN interview, he defended the decision to go to war.
The comments come in advance of a timetable being published for the results of the public inquiry into Britain's role in Iraq.
Daniel Boettcher reports.
